title: Chapter 1846 - Gu Yunchan
body:
Chapter 1846 - Gu Yunchan

Old Man Providence’s youngest disciple was an extraordinarily famous figure among the God Domain’s Great Realm experts. 

Well, maybe the better word was “infamous.”

His name was Gu Yunchan, and his true body was a Gu Huo Bird. He was crafty, ruthless, and unfathomably powerful. Among the God Domain’s yao cultivators, he was ranked among the Ten Great Yao Sovereigns, and his name shook his entire region. Countless deities of the Yao Path thought highly of him and believed he was sure to one day sit among them.

“Where is he?” Xi Ning’s eyes glinted with icy light, her expression utterly murderous.

She’d borne a deep grudge against Gu Yunchan for a long time, and she hated him to the bone.

This was because, during one of the God Domain’s Great Realm Sparring Battles, Gu Yunchan had brutally killed Xi Ning’s younger brother, Xi Yu!

She’d hated him ever since, and back in the God Domain, she’d tried to avenge her brother several times over. However, Gu Yunchan was hard to track down, and he was as crafty as a fox. All of Xi Ning’s attempts...
